subtitle: This can also be served as an accompaniment to a main meal.

method.text: Preheat grill to a medium heat.
Brush aubergine and courgette with the olive oil. Grill gently for 2-3 min each side or until crisp and golden brown.
Mix any remaining oil with the basil, lemon rind and juice and seasoning.
Arrange the aubergine, courgettes, tomatoes, cheese and onion slices in individual ovenproof dishes. Sprinkle over the dressing.
Grill for 3-5 min or until cheese has just melted.

title: Mediterranean veggie starter
